snippet: The plot, led by military exiles loyal to the country’s former president, prompted authorities to close all border and institute a curfew.
lead_paragraph: The plot, led by military exiles loyal to the country’s former president, prompted authorities to close all border and institute a curfew.

headline.main: Ivory Coast: Coup Plot Foiled, Officials Say
